member.name: T:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBoxWindow
member.summary: Interaction logic for ModalDialog.xaml

member.name: M:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBoxWindow.InitializeComponent
member.summary: InitializeComponent

member.name: T:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBox
member.summary: Displays a message box.

member.name: M:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBox.Show(System.String)
member.summary: Displays a message box that has a message and returns a result.
member.param: A System.String that specifies the text to display.
member.returns: A System.Windows.MessageBoxResult value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

member.name: M:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBox.Show(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Displays a message box that has a message and a title bar caption; and that returns a result.
member.param: A System.String that specifies the text to display.
A System.String that specifies the title bar caption to display.
member.returns: A System.Windows.MessageBoxResult value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

member.name: M:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBox.Show(System.Windows.Window,System.String)
member.summary: Displays a message box in front of the specified window. The message box displays a message and returns a result.
member.param: A System.Windows.Window that represents the owner window of the message box.
A System.String that specifies the text to display.
member.returns: A System.Windows.MessageBoxResult value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

member.name: M:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBox.Show(System.Windows.Window,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Displays a message box in front of the specified window. The message box displays a message and title bar caption; and it returns a result.
member.param: A System.Windows.Window that represents the owner window of the message box.
A System.String that specifies the text to display.
A System.String that specifies the title bar caption to display.
member.returns: A System.Windows.MessageBoxResult value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

member.name: M:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBox.Show(System.String,System.String,System.Windows.MessageBoxButton)
member.summary: Displays a message box that has a message, title bar caption, and button; and that returns a result.
member.param: A System.String that specifies the text to display.
A System.String that specifies the title bar caption to display.
A System.Windows.MessageBoxButton value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
member.returns: A System.Windows.MessageBoxResult value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

member.name: M:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBox.Show(System.String,System.String,System.Windows.MessageBoxButton,System.Windows.MessageBoxImage)
member.summary: Displays a message box that has a message, title bar caption, button, and icon; and that returns a result.
member.param: A System.String that specifies the text to display.
A System.String that specifies the title bar caption to display.
A System.Windows.MessageBoxButton value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
A System.Windows.MessageBoxImage value that specifies the icon to display.
member.returns: A System.Windows.MessageBoxResult value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

member.name: M:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBox.ShowOK(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Displays a message box that has a message, title bar caption, and OK button with a custom System.String value for the button's text; and that returns a result.
member.param: A System.String that specifies the text to display.
A System.String that specifies the title bar caption to display.
A System.String that specifies the text to display within the OK button.
member.returns: A System.Windows.MessageBoxResult value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

member.name: M:WPFCustomMessageBox.CustomMessageBox.ShowOK(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Windows.MessageBoxImage)
member.summary: Displays a message box that has a message, title bar caption, OK button with a custom System.String value for the button's text, and icon; and that returns a result.
member.param: A System.String that specifies the text to display.
A System.String that specifies the title bar caption to display.
A System.String that specifies the text to display within the OK button.
A System.Windows.MessageBoxImage value that specifies the icon to display.
member.returns: A System.Windows.MessageBoxResult value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

member.summary: Displays a message box that has a message, caption, and OK/Cancel buttons with custom System.String values for the buttons' text; and that returns a result.
member.param: A System.String that specifies the text to display.
A System.String that specifies the title bar caption to display.
A System.String that specifies the text to display within the OK button.
A System.String that specifies the text to display within the Cancel button.
member.returns: A System.Windows.MessageBoxResult value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

member.name: T:WPFCustomMessageBox.Util
member.summary: TODO: Update summary.

member.name: M:WPFCustomMessageBox.Util.TryAddKeyboardAccellerator(System.String)
member.summary: Keyboard Accellerators are used in Windows to allow easy shortcuts to controls like Buttons and MenuItems. These allow users to press the Alt key, and a shortcut key will be highlighted on the control. If the user presses that key, that control will be activated. This method checks a string if it contains a keyboard accellerator. If it doesn't, it adds one to the beginning of the string. If there are two strings with the same accellerator, Windows handles it. The keyboard accellerator character for WPF is underscore (_). It will not be visible.

member.name: T:WPFCustomMessageBox.Properties.Resources

member.name: P:WPFCustomMessageBox.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager

member.name: P:WPFCustomMessageBox.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
